sentences.english: The Type 037-I can be distinguished by its bulky radome positioned on the bridge roof ahead of the tripod mast.
sentences.chinese: 型以它位于舰桥顶部三脚桅杆上的庞大天线罩为特点。

sentences.english: The Brute looked about the bridge, blinked, and then glared at Fred.
sentences.chinese: 鬼面兽看着舰桥，眨着眼睛，然后怒视着弗雷德。

sentences.english: Get her off my bridge, and throw her in the brig.
sentences.chinese: 把她带下我的舰桥，扔到禁闭室去。

sentences.english: He arrived on the Bridge and there was only Vanessa and Kim.
sentences.chinese: 他来到舰桥时，哪里只有凡妮莎和吉姆。

sentences.english: After writing his flight report, Rick went to the bridge area.
sentences.chinese: 在写完飞行报告后，瑞克向舰桥方向走去。

sentences.english: Its bustling bridge is staffed by the finest crewers in the Imperial starfleet.
sentences.chinese: 其忙碌的舰桥里配备了帝国星际舰队最优秀的成员。

sentences.english: Commander Riker, please report to the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 瑞克中校，请向舰桥报到。

sentences.english: Eventually, the Rebel ships were able to penetrate its powerful bridge shields.
sentences.chinese: 最后，义军飞船突破其强大的舰桥护盾。

definition: island (the superstructure of an aircraft carrier, on the starboard side of the deck)
